name: Rage (itch) (Trash456)
description:
submitted on: 190th trijam

kill as many enemies as you can on a highly reaction-based and fast-paced action game.

controls:

right = play

up = jump

space = slash

space + right = forward slash

space + up = uppercut slash

space + down (on air) - downward slam

credits:

music - dragon symphony

sfx - maoudamashii, freesounds

everything else - me
